go_data.justification: VAMP4 contains a conventional cargo motif (ExxxLL motif) and participates in vesicle fusion events, implying SNARE binding activity.
VAMP4 mediates the fusion of vesicles, specifically in TGN-to-endosome transport.
VAMP4 cycles from the cell surface to the trans-Golgi network via sorting and recycling endosomes.
VAMP4 is involved in TGN-to-endosome transport and cycles through endosomes.
